txt.en: Deliver the pie to Ogiva Túcca
Deliver the pie to Erma Túcca
Greeting Gísla Bolga

'Is Ubbo off fishing again? Then who's going to handle today's pie deliveries?! Hmmm, will you? That would be very kind of you! I baked these pies for Madelgard, Ogiva, and Erma. They are fresh and hot, and need to be delivered immediately. You can only carry one pie at a time though! They're fragile and if one were to drop on the ground... I shudder even at the thought!'
'Is Ubbo off fishing again?'
A freshly baked pie can be found in Lyndelby.\n\nYou should deliver the pie to Ogiva Túcca.
A freshly baked pie can be found in Lyndelby.\n\nYou should deliver the pie to Madelgard Túcca.
You have failed to deliver the pie
A freshly baked pie can be found in Lyndelby.\n\nYou should deliver the pie to Erma Túcca.
'Thanks for delivering one of Gísla's famous pies! Now I don't have to journey all the way to her home to pick it up myself!'
'Oh how lovely! Now which meal shall I save this pie for?'
'That is very kind of you! I have been looking forward to eating one of Gísla's grand pies all day!'
Pick up the pie from the table
Gísla Bolga can be found in Lyndelby.\n\nYou should talk to Gísla Bolga.
Pick up the pie from the table
Pick up the pie from the table

'Oh, [placeholder], I'm so glad you've come to visit!'

'Ubbo's off fishing again, and he's entirely forgotten that I asked him to handle today's pie deliveries!

'Would you help me instead? I know you were hoping to take some time to rest here in Lyndelby, but this simply won't do. You see, I just finished baking these pies for Madelgard, Ogiva, and Erma, and they need to be delivered immediately!

'You can only carry one pie at a time though! They're fragile and if one were to drop on the ground... I shudder even at the thought!'

'Goodness me! All the pies have been delivered and not a single slice dropped? Ubbo is lucky you're not here all the time!

'You know, I have been told that I bake the best pies in all of Lyndelby. It is quite the burden! Why, I imagine you often find yourself in similar predicaments on your adventures, [placeholder]! Pies, I understand, but deliveries are always stressful. Even so, I would hate to see even one slice go to waste!

'Thank you for your help today, [placeholder]. I'll try not to trouble you with anything else during your visit. And I'll make sure Ubbo delivers twice the pies tomorrow!'

'All the pies have been delivered and not a single slice dropped? I'm very relieved to hear that! Oh, my apologies. In my haste to have the pies delivered, I forgot my manners. My name is Gísla Bolga, and it's a pleasure to make your acquaintance! I have been told that I bake the best pies in all of Lyndelby. Pie delivery day is always stressful. Pies are my trade, but they're also an art form after all. I would hate to see even one slice go to waste! Thank you for helping out. I'll make sure Ubbo delivers twice the pies tomorrow!'
You have failed to deliver the pie
You have failed to deliver the pie
There are many occupants of the hidden village of Lyndelby who are curious to meet with you.
Deliver the pie to Madelgard Túcca
Talk to Gísla Bolga in Lyndelby
DNT Do something nice
'All the pies have been delivered and not a single slice dropped? I'm very relieved to hear that!'
